faq.access_duration_description: Access depends on your subscription plan. Basic plans have limited access, while premium plans offer full 24/7 access.
faq.available_languages: In what languages are the audios available?
faq.available_languages_description: We currently offer audios in Spanish, English and French. We are working to add more languages.
faq.technical_issues: What to do if I have technical problems?
faq.technical_issues_description: If you experience any problems, contact our technical support through WhatsApp or email. We respond in less than 24 hours.
